creator: jfp@clearfield.com
text:
debug logging is always on. This is because the while the DEBUG variable is set
to false, the code uses #ifdef DEBUG instead of #if DEBUG.

creator: pier@betaversion.org
text: Correct, this needs to be addressed.

"mod_webapp is deprecated and unsupported due to lack of developer interest.
Please use mod_jk, or jk2"
creator: funkman@joedog.org
